realm.name: judge
realm.description: BJCP certified judge - can view flight assignments, submit scoresheets, participate in BOS

realm.name: organizer
realm.description: Competition organizer - can create competitions, manage entries, publish results

realm.name: entrant
realm.description: Competition entrant - can register beers, pay fees, view results

realm.name: steward
realm.description: Competition steward - can check in bottles, manage physical logistics

clients.name: BFF API Gateway
clients.description: Confidential client for BFF/API Gateway - validates frontend tokens

clients.name: Competition Microservice
clients.description: Service account client for Competition Service - validates tokens from BFF

clients.name: Spa client & Swagger Client
clients.description: Public client for React SPA with PKCE

clients.name: Judging Microservice
clients.description: Service account client for Judging Service - validates tokens from BFF

clients.name: Swagger UI (Development Only)
clients.description: Public client for Swagger UI OAuth2 testing with PKCE

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token
